name: In re The FEBRUARY, 1984, ALLEGHENY COUNTY INVESTIGATING GRAND JURY, Petitioner. (Matter of Subpoena of Michael D. FOGLIA, Esquire)
name_abbreviation: In re the February, 1984, Allegheny County Investigating Grand Jury

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: In re The FEBRUARY, 1984, ALLEGHENY COUNTY INVESTIGATING GRAND JURY, Petitioner. (Matter of Subpoena of Michael D. FOGLIA, Esquire).

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Matter dismissed as moot.
LARSEN and HUTCHINSON, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Leo M. Dillon, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for petitioner.
Stanton D. Levenson, Pittsburgh, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
509 A.2d 1255
In re The FEBRUARY, 1984, ALLEGHENY COUNTY INVESTIGATING GRAND JURY, Petitioner. (Matter of Subpoena of Michael D. FOGLIA, Esquire).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 13, 1986.
Decided May 29, 1986.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Leo M. Dillon, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for petitioner.
Stanton D. Levenson, Pittsburgh, for respondent.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
